name: Star Trek Trexels
summary: Star Trek Trexels is a video game for iOS and Android devices in which you are an admiral in control of a starship exploring a newly-discovered region of space, named the Trexelian Expanse, for the USS Valiant, whose current status is unknown. The game is a micro-manager in which you build rooms on the ship, train crew, and control them in their day-to-day functions.
